title: Was Flight 19 Sabotaged by Nazi's?
description:
My special guest is Erik Orion who's here to discuss details about what he believes really happened to Flight 19. Get his book Sabotage on Amazon.
Do you enjoy paranormal episodes? Follow our new podcast 'Paranormal Fears' on any podcast app or Apple Podcasts.
Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now.
